languages.text: "Скажи, Торбальд, если бы Оптикон-22 заявился на Фенрис и принялся командовать, что бы ты сделал?"
"Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"
languages.original_text: "Скажи, Торбальд, если бы Оптикон-22 заявился на Фенрис и принялся командовать, что бы ты сделал?"

traits.locale_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald. If Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering your around, what would you do?"
"Answer me this, Thorbald. If Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering your around, what would you do?"
"Answer me this, Thorbald. If Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"
"Answer me this, Thorbald. If Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"
"Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"
"Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"

languages.text: “回答我这个问题，索巴德。如果奥普蒂孔22号去了芬里斯，对你发号施令，你会怎么做？”
languages.original_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: “回答我这个问题，索巴德。如果奥普蒂孔22号去了芬里斯，对你发号施令，你会怎么做？”

languages.text: « Dites-moi, Thorbald. Si Opticon-22 débarquait sur Fenris en vous donnant des ordres, que feriez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, Thorbald. Si Opticon-22 débarquait sur Fenris en vous donnant des ordres, que feriez-vous ? »

languages.text: 「答えてくれ、トールバルド。もしオプティコン-22がフェンリスにやってきてお前に命令し出したら、お前はどうする？」
languages.original_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: 「答えてくれ、トールバルド。もしオプティコン-22がフェンリスにやってきてお前に命令し出したら、お前はどうする？」

languages.text: «Contésteme, Thorbald. ¿Qué haría si de repente Opticon-22 viniera a Fenris y se pusiera a mangonearle?».
languages.original_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: «Contésteme, Thorbald. ¿Qué haría si de repente Opticon-22 viniera a Fenris y se pusiera a mangonearle?».

languages.text: "Beantwortet mir dies, Thorbald. Würde Opticon-22 nach Fenris kommen und anfangen, Euch herumzukommandieren, was würdet Ihr tun?"
languages.original_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: "Beantwortet mir dies, Thorbald. Würde Opticon-22 nach Fenris kommen und anfangen, Euch herumzukommandieren, was würdet Ihr tun?"

languages.text: "Bana şunu söyle Thorbald: Opticon-22, Fenris'e gelip emir yağdırmaya başlasa ne yapardın?"
languages.original_text: "Answer me this, Thorbald: if Opticon-22 were to come to Fenris and start ordering you around, what would you do?"
